subject: Investing
title: Fundamental Analysis for Crypto
description: A short lesson to help you apply Fundamental Analysis for Crypto.

hook.text: How do you value something with no earnings and no cash flow? Crypto demands a new analytical toolkit.

buildup.text: Crypto fundamentals include network activity, developer commits, protocol revenue, and user growth rates.

discovery.text: DeFi protocols that generate fee revenue can be valued like businesses: price relative to earnings.

twist.text: Most crypto assets trade on narrative and momentum, not fundamentalsâ€”making fundamental analysis contrarian.

climax.text: Combining on-chain metrics with traditional valuation frameworks gives the clearest picture of fair value.

punchline.text: In crypto, the fundamentals exist. Most investors just don't bother looking.

quiz.question: Which metric helps fundamentally value a DeFi protocol?
options: Protocol revenue relative to token price
